            href="https://s.yimg.jp/images/shp_shared_parts/v2/2.0.172/css/__scoped__/_frontDelivery/pc/style.css"
            onload="const init = () => {
    const href = this.href;
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('head link');
    const hasSameCss = Array.from(links).some((link) => link.href === href);
    if (!hasSameCss) {
      const newLink = document.createElement('link');
      newLink.rel = 'stylesheet';
      newLink.href = href;
      document.head.appendChild(newLink);
    }
    this.parentElement.remove();
  };
  if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
    setTimeout(init, 100);
  } else {
    document.addEventListener('readystatechange', (event) => {
      if (event.target.readyState === 'complete') {
        setTimeout(init, 100);
      }
    });
  }"

            onload="const init = () => {
    const href = this.href;
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('head link');
    const hasSameCss = Array.from(links).some((link) => link.href === href);
    if (!hasSameCss) {
      const newLink = document.createElement('link');
      newLink.rel = 'stylesheet';
      newLink.href = href;
      document.head.appendChild(newLink);
    }
    this.parentElement.remove();
  };
  if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
    setTimeout(init, 100);
  } else {
    document.addEventListener('readystatechange', (event) => {
      if (event.target.readyState === 'complete') {
        setTimeout(init, 100);
      }
    });
  }"

    const href = this.href;
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('head link');

      document.head.appendChild(newLink);

            onload="const init = () => {
    const href = this.href;
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('head link');
    const hasSameCss = Array.from(links).some((link) => link.href === href);
    if (!hasSameCss) {
      const newLink = document.createElement('link');
      newLink.rel = 'stylesheet';
      newLink.href = href;
      document.head.appendChild(newLink);
    }
    this.parentElement.remove();
  };
  if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
    setTimeout(init, 100);
  } else {
    document.addEventListener('readystatechange', (event) => {
      if (event.target.readyState === 'complete') {
        setTimeout(init, 100);
      }
    });

      document.head.appendChild(newLink);

          <link
            rel="stylesheet"
            href="https://s.yimg.jp/images/shp_shared_parts/v2/2.0.172/css/__scoped__/_frontDelivery/pc/style.css"
            onload="const init = () => {
    const href = this.href;
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('head link');
    const hasSameCss = Array.from(links).some((link) => link.href === href);
    if (!hasSameCss) {
      const newLink = document.createElement('link');
      newLink.rel = 'stylesheet';
      newLink.href = href;
      document.head.appendChild(newLink);
    }
    this.parentElement.remove();
  };
  if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
    setTimeout(init, 100);
  } else {
    document.addEventListener('readystatechange', (event) => {
      if (event.target.readyState === 'complete') {
        setTimeout(init, 100);
      }
    });
  }"
          /></div><style data-emotion="css 15hhdz4">.css-15hhdz4 .wrap{padding:40px 40px;background:white;border-radius:12px;}.css-15hhdz4 .carousel{position:relative;}@media (hover:     const href = this.href;
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('head link');
    const hasSameCss = Array.from(links).some((link) => link.href === href);
    if (!hasSameCss) {
      const newLink = document.createElement('link');
      newLink.rel = 'stylesheet';
      newLink.href = href;
      document.head.appendChild(newLink);
    }
    this.parentElement.remove();
  };
  if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
    setTimeout(init, 100);

      if (event.target.readyState === 'complete') {

    const href = this.href;
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('head link');

      document.head.appendChild(newLink);

          <link
            rel="stylesheet"
            href="https://s.yimg.jp/images/shp_shared_parts/v2/2.0.172/css/__scoped__/_frontDelivery/pc/style.css"
            onload="const init = () => {
    const href = this.href;
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('head link');
    const hasSameCss = Array.from(links).some((link) => link.href === href);
    if (!hasSameCss) {
      const newLink = document.createElement('link');
      newLink.rel = 'stylesheet';
      newLink.href = href;
      document.head.appendChild(newLink);
    }
    this.parentElement.remove();
  };
  if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
    setTimeout(init, 100);
  } else {
    document.addEventListener('readystatechange', (event) => {
      if (event.target.readyState === 'complete') {
        setTimeout(init, 100);
      }
    });
  }"
          /></div><style data-emotion="css 15hhdz4">.css-15hhdz4 .wrap{padding:40px 40px;background:white;border-radius:12px;}.css-15hhdz4 .carousel{position:relative;}@media (hover:             onload="const init = () => {
    const href = this.href;
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('head link');
    const hasSameCss = Array.from(links).some((link) => link.href === href);
    if (!hasSameCss) {
      const newLink = document.createElement('link');
      newLink.rel = 'stylesheet';
      newLink.href = href;
      document.head.appendChild(newLink);
    }
    this.parentElement.remove();
  };
  if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
    setTimeout(init, 100);
  } else {
    document.addEventListener('readystatechange', (event) => {
      if (event.target.readyState === 'complete') {
        setTimeout(init, 100);
      }

    const href = this.href;
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('head link');

    const links = document.querySelectorAll('head link');
